titleStmt.title: A short view of the prelatical church of England laid open in ten sections by way of quere and petition to the High and Honourable Court of Parliament, the several heads whereof are set down in the next two pages / written a little before the fall of that hierarchie, about the year 1641, by Iohn Barnard, sometime minister of Batcomb in Somerset-shire ; whereunto is added The anatomy of The common-prayer.
titleStmt.author: Bernard, Richard, 1568-1641.
Bernard, John.

notesStmt.note: Written by Richard Bernard. Cf. DNB.
Variously ascribed to Richard Bernard, John Bernard, minister of Batcomb, and John Bernard, Presbyterian. Cf. Green, E. Bib. Somersetensis, 1902,v. 2, p. 165.
"The anatomie of the Common prayer-book" by Dwalphintramis has special t.p. and separate paging.
Place of publication from NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
